_comment: This is a custom security configuration file for documentation and reference purposes
csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://avatars.githubusercontent.com https://*.githubusercontent.com; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests;

headers.Permissions-Policy: geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=(), payment=(), usb=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=(), speaker=()

notes.unsafe_inline: CSP includes 'unsafe-inline' for script-src and style-src to support the portfolio's inline scripts and styles. This is a known trade-off between functionality and security. For maximum security, consider moving to external files with nonces or SRI hashes.
notes.location_override: Cannot override window.location property due to browser security restrictions. Instead, we override location.assign() and location.replace() methods.
notes.github_pages: GitHub Pages does not support custom _headers file. Security headers are implemented via meta tags in HTML files.
